author: jwwetzel
body:
This PR updates the HF radiation damage (SimG4CMS/Calo) and HF Recalibration (DataFormats/HcalCalibObjects) classes in three important ways:

**The first way** are new values: higher resolution dose map for the Damage class and updated recalibration functions for the recalibration functions.

**The second way** is a migration of the factors and function parameters out of the classes themselves, and into configurable python files.

**The third way** relocates the HFRecalibration classes from CalibCalorimetry/HcalPlugins to DataFormats/HcalCalibObjects.

These classes are used outside of standard workflows, only for studying HCAL and in particular HF future performance.

In particular:
- HFRecalParameterBlock is defined in HFRecalParameters_cff and included in Hcal_Conditions_forGlobalTag_cff for use in HcalHardcodeCalibrations.cc.
- HFDarkeningParameterBlock is defined in HFDarkeningParams_cff and included in g4SimHits_cfi for use in HcalSD.cc.
- HcalDigitzer.cc is updated to handle new HFRecalibration class.
title: HF Radiation Damage Simulation V2016
